docs.snippet: Four black people were charged with hate crimes Thursday in connection with a video broadcast live on Facebook that showed a mentally disabled white man being beaten and taunted, threatened with a knife and forced to drink from a toilet....
docs.lead_paragraph: Four black people were charged with hate crimes Thursday in connection with a video broadcast live on Facebook that showed a mentally disabled white man being beaten and taunted, threatened with a knife and forced to drink from a toilet.

headline.main: Hate-Crime Charges Filed in Attack on Mentally Disabled Man
headline.print_headline: Hate-Crime Charges Filed in Attack on Mentally Disabled Man

docs.snippet: World number one Angelique Kerber was knocked out of the Brisbane International by Elina Svitolina on Thursday while second seed Dominika Cibulkova also succumbed to a quarter-final upset....
docs.lead_paragraph: World number one Angelique Kerber was knocked out of the Brisbane International by Elina Svitolina on Thursday while second seed Dominika Cibulkova also succumbed to a quarter-final upset.

headline.main: Svitolina Upsets Kerber, Muguruza Labors Into Last Four
headline.print_headline: Svitolina Upsets Kerber, Muguruza Labors Into Last Four

docs.snippet: British American Tobacco (BAT) has quit plans to market a nicotine inhaler called Voke to focus on consumer items like e-cigarettes rather than health products....
docs.lead_paragraph: British American Tobacco (BAT) has quit plans to market a nicotine inhaler called Voke to focus on consumer items like e-cigarettes rather than health products.

headline.main: BAT Quits Nicotine Inhaler to Focus on Vaping
headline.print_headline: BAT Quits Nicotine Inhaler to Focus on Vaping

docs.snippet: Winter storm watches cover parts of Georgia, Alabama and the Carolinas ahead of a storm system that threatens to bring a wintry mix of rain, sleet and snow to the South....
docs.lead_paragraph: Winter storm watches cover parts of Georgia, Alabama and the Carolinas ahead of a storm system that threatens to bring a wintry mix of rain, sleet and snow to the South.

headline.main: Winter Storm Watches Issued as Wintry Mix Threatens South
headline.print_headline: Winter Storm Watches Issued as Wintry Mix Threatens South

docs.snippet: The U.S. Coast Guard said on Thursday a fire on an oil platform in the Gulf of Mexico off Grand Isle, Louisiana was extinguished and the source of the oil was secured....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Coast Guard said on Thursday a fire on an oil platform in the Gulf of Mexico off Grand Isle, Louisiana was extinguished and the source of the oil was secured.

headline.main: Oil Platform Fire in Gulf of Mexico Extinguished: U.S. Coast Guard
headline.print_headline: Oil Platform Fire in Gulf of Mexico Extinguished: U.S. Coast Guard

docs.snippet: A fire broke out on an oil production platform in the Gulf of Mexico early Thursday, forcing four workers to evacuate by lifeboat before the blaze was extinguished. There were no injuries and inspectors found no sign of pollution, authorities said...
docs.lead_paragraph: A fire broke out on an oil production platform in the Gulf of Mexico early Thursday, forcing four workers to evacuate by lifeboat before the blaze was extinguished. There were no injuries and inspectors found no sign of pollution, authorities said.

headline.main: Coast Guard: Fire Extinguished on Platform in Gulf of Mexico
headline.print_headline: Coast Guard: Fire Extinguished on Platform in Gulf of Mexico

docs.snippet: Strong winds and snow in Poland have delayed flights, cut power lines and flooded some farmland in the north and led to traffic accidents in central and southern regions....
docs.lead_paragraph: Strong winds and snow in Poland have delayed flights, cut power lines and flooded some farmland in the north and led to traffic accidents in central and southern regions.

headline.main: Wind, Snow Blocks Airport, Cuts Power in Northern Poland
headline.print_headline: Wind, Snow Blocks Airport, Cuts Power in Northern Poland

docs.snippet: Easter has come early to the German North Sea island of Langeoog....
docs.lead_paragraph: Easter has come early to the German North Sea island of Langeoog.

headline.main: Flood of Plastic Eggs Delights Children on North Sea Island
headline.print_headline: Flood of Plastic Eggs Delights Children on North Sea Island

docs.snippet: Real wages for German workers with collective agreements rose less sharply in 2016 than in the previous two years, a study showed on Thursday, suggesting consumers' purchasing power is being hit by rising inflation....
docs.lead_paragraph: Real wages for German workers with collective agreements rose less sharply in 2016 than in the previous two years, a study showed on Thursday, suggesting consumers' purchasing power is being hit by rising inflation.

headline.main: German Real Wages Rose Less Sharply in 2016 Due to Inflation-Study
headline.print_headline: German Real Wages Rose Less Sharply in 2016 Due to Inflation-Study

docs.snippet: Philippine security forces killed the leader of a militant group supporting Islamic State in a clash early on Thursday, the country's police chief said, warning against possible retaliation....
docs.lead_paragraph: Philippine security forces killed the leader of a militant group supporting Islamic State in a clash early on Thursday, the country's police chief said, warning against possible retaliation.

headline.main: Philippines Kills Leader of Islamic State-Linked Militant Group in Clash
headline.print_headline: Philippines Kills Leader of Islamic State-Linked Militant Group in Clash
